QAPair.Question: What is (are) Vaginitis - self-care ?
QAPair.Answer: Vaginitis is a swelling or infection of the vulva and vagina. It may also be called vulvovaginitis. Vaginitis is a common problem that can affect women and girls of all ages. It can be caused by: Yeast , bacteria, viruses, and parasites, Bubble baths, soaps, vaginal contraceptives, feminine sprays, and perfumes (chemicals), Menopause, Not washing well ,

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Vaginitis - self-care ?
